features.title: Promotion Development
features.description: Our team will help you concept, design, and socialize a highly motivating consumer and publisher facing promotional offer.

features.title: Fan Page Recruitment
features.description: Leverage our network to recruit the right syndication partners for your brand. Our apps reach millions of fans across nearly every demographic.

features.title: Campaign Management
features.description: North Social manages the entire syndication process, including tech deployment and support, advanced analytics, and full performance tracking reports.

features.title: Comprehensive Fulfillment
features.description: A Syndication Specialist works directly with you to assist with any or all of the following; drafting of official rules & legal review, bonding, registration, and winner selection & notification, and prize fulfillment.
